body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Grand Hotel Support. My name is Nicholas Alexander. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Nicholas, my name is Sandra Bennett.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hi Sandra! Thank you. Can you please provide me with the room number of your recent stay and the date of check-in to assist you better?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I stayed in room two three four and checked in on the third of August.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sandra. I see that information here. Additionally, could you provide the last four digits of the credit card used for the reservation and the total number of nights of your stay?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits of the credit card are five six seven eight and I stayed for four nights.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Sandra. I will look into the cleanliness issue you mentioned during your stay.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That would be great, thank you so much. I'm relieved that it's being addressed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sandra. Thank you for your cooperation and for reaching out to us. We aim to provide excellent service. Have a wonderful day!
